name: part_001
file: tmp_【#冥ハロ2025】白上フブキ生誕３DLIVE「冥界Halloween Night!」【白上フブキ⧸ホロライブ】 [7Tm7dVsTPBk]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Shirakami Fubuki singing a ballad on a dark stage with yellow floral effects.
Instrumental transition with spoken word poetry.
Performance of 'Hoshizora e to Tsuzuku Sakamichi'.
Cinematic credits sequence introducing guest members.
Performance of 'Isekai Kyousoukyoku' on a grand stage.

subtitles.original: どれだけ歌っても
subtitles.english: No matter how much I sing,

subtitles.original: この声は君には届かない
subtitles.english: this voice will not reach you.

subtitles.original: ああ どれだけ歌っても
subtitles.english: Ah, no matter how much I sing,

subtitles.original: この声は君には届かない
subtitles.english: this voice will not reach you.

subtitles.original: ああ 息が苦しくなる
subtitles.english: Ah, it becomes hard to breathe.

subtitles.original: この歌もいつしか終わりが来る
subtitles.english: This song too will eventually come to an end.

subtitles.original: ああ 息が苦しくなる
subtitles.english: Ah, it becomes hard to breathe.

subtitles.original: この地球もいつかは終わりが来る
subtitles.english: This planet too will eventually come to an end.

subtitles.original: 金木犀の匂いをまた
subtitles.english: The scent of osmanthus again...

subtitles.original: 思い出した
subtitles.english: ...I remembered.

subtitles.original: 気付けば駆け出していた
subtitles.english: Before I knew it, I was running,

subtitles.original: 揺れ動く心のままに
subtitles.english: following my wavering heart.

subtitles.original: 遠ざかる白い壁
subtitles.english: The receding white walls,

subtitles.original: 一度も振り返らずに
subtitles.english: without looking back even once.

subtitles.original: 命が消え逝く季節の
subtitles.english: Of the season when life fades away,

subtitles.original: 胸を刺す気配の中で
subtitles.english: in the presence that pierces my chest.

subtitles.original: 迫りくる暗い闇
subtitles.english: The approaching dark darkness,

subtitles.original: 二度と明けないような気がして
subtitles.english: feeling like it will never dawn again.

subtitles.original: 転がり落ちそうな心
subtitles.english: My heart that seems about to roll down,

subtitles.original: 必死に抱き止めていた
subtitles.english: I was desperately holding it back.

subtitles.original: 星空へと続く長い坂道は
subtitles.english: The long slope leading to the starry sky...

subtitles.original: 永遠にも思えたから
subtitles.english: ...seemed like it would last forever.

subtitles.original: 咲く花や散りぬるを
subtitles.english: Blooming flowers and falling ones,

subtitles.original: 神代の時より繰り返す
subtitles.english: repeating since the age of gods.

subtitles.original: 私はそれを美しいとは
subtitles.english: I have never thought...

subtitles.original: 思ったことがない
subtitles.english: ...that that is beautiful.

subtitles.original: 絶えず久方の春の陽を
subtitles.english: Constantly, the eternal spring sunlight,

subtitles.original: 仮初の影が奪い合う
subtitles.english: temporary shadows snatch from each other.

subtitles.original: その営みを美しいとは
subtitles.english: I have never thought...

subtitles.original: 思ったことがない
subtitles.english: ...that that cycle is beautiful.

subtitles.original: 諦めながら生きてた
subtitles.english: I lived while giving up,

subtitles.original: 何も望まないように
subtitles.english: trying not to wish for anything,

subtitles.original: それでも
subtitles.english: but still...

subtitles.original: 手放せなかった
subtitles.english: ...I couldn't let go.

subtitles.original: 最後の願いを
subtitles.english: Clutching the last wish,

subtitles.original: 握りしめて駆け上がる
subtitles.english: I run up the slope.

subtitles.original: 我武者羅に生きるお前が笑われて
subtitles.english: You, living recklessly, are laughed at,

subtitles.original: 楽に生きる奴が得をする世界で
subtitles.english: in a world where those who live easily gain.

subtitles.original: 我だけはお前のことを笑わない
subtitles.english: Only I will not laugh at you!

subtitles.original: 皆が指差し笑おうとも我は笑わない
subtitles.english: Even if everyone points and laughs, I will not laugh!

subtitles.original: ああ 人は滅んでゆく ほころんでゆく
subtitles.english: Ah, people perish, they come apart.

subtitles.original: 才を妬み合い 富を奪い合い
subtitles.english: Envying talent, stealing wealth.

subtitles.original: ああ 人は滅んでゆく ほころんでゆく
subtitles.english: Ah, people perish, they come apart.

subtitles.original: その果てに見えた海は
subtitles.english: The sea seen at the end of that...

subtitles.original: 地獄だろうか それとも地獄だろうか
subtitles.english: is it hell? Or is it hell?

subtitles.original: 我武者羅に生きるお前が笑われて
subtitles.english: You, living recklessly, are laughed at,

subtitles.original: 楽に生きる奴が得をする世界で
subtitles.english: in a world where those who live easily gain.

subtitles.original: 我だけはお前のことを笑わない
subtitles.english: Only I will not laugh at you!
